Title: Truly, Madly, Deeply
Plot: Denny is called to defend a man who raped and killed a 13-year-old girl, but decides he'd rather go to jail than spend his days defending murderers.  Meanwhile, Alan must face his fear of clowns and Shirley dumps a bizarre bestiality case on Denise.
GuestStars: Pam Trotter,  Angela  Chee,  Laura Henry,  Larry King,  Michael McKean,  Jon Sklaroff,  Marc Vann,  Pat Skipper,  Joel McKinnon Miller,  Austin Tichenor,  Francesca P. Roberts,  Lisa Banes,  Susan Ruttan
